function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact among gardeners may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases within the gardening community, leading to health issues.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures and promote regular hand washing and hygiene practices among gardeners.","Technologies":"Use of signage and barriers to enforce social distancing, and distribution of hand sanitizers and hygiene education materials.","People":"Gardeners, community members who visit the garden.","Owner":"Community leaders, garden administrators, public health authorities."},{"Description":"High frequency of garden usage may increase the risk of exposure to airborne diseases.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of respiratory infections and contagious diseases among frequent garden users.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of face masks and proper ventilation in garden areas, and limit the number of people in crowded garden spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and face mask distribution.","People":"Frequent garden users, visitors to the garden.","Owner":"Garden administrators, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Correlation between emotional/mental health and COVID-19 anxiety may indicate a higher risk of psychological distress and mental health challenges within the garden community.","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and mental health problems among gardeners due to heightened COVID-19 concerns.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health resources, counseling services, and promote community support networks for gardeners.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, and online support groups.","People":"Gardeners, individuals experiencing COVID-19 anxiety.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community leaders."}]}
